en: It is a huge sigh of relief , because it could have been much worse and Baghdad could have been a war theater with more destruction to property .
zh: 这是一个巨大的松了一口气，因为它本来可以更糟，巴格达可能是一个战争剧院，对财产造成更多的破坏。

en: The British said they had enough control over the area to begin sending in ships .
zh: 英国人说他们对该地区有足够的控制权，可以开始派遣 船只。

en: By going into their territory and building these walls or building settlements -- pushing the Palestinians out and -- Palestinians -- fight -- with rocks and -- sticks and -- Israelis have their machine guns and bulldozers and -- I just -- t- really unpalatable that the -- whole idea , the -- the way they 're going about -- this thing and -- I do n't really feel qualified -- to say how it should be , but -- I -- see it -- being wrong to -- hurt children and -- innocent people .
zh: 通过进入他们的领土并建造这些墙或建造定居点 -- 将巴勒斯坦人赶出去 -- 巴勒斯坦人 -- 用石头和 -- 棍棒打架 -- 以色列人有他们的机枪和推土机并且--我只是-- 真的很讨厌--整个想法，-- 他们的行事方式-- 这件事-- 我真的觉得没有资格-- 说它应该怎么做是，但是 - 我 - 明白 - 伤害儿童和 - 无辜的人是错误的。
